pkgmetadata.longdescription: Fuzzy Cognitive Maps Operations // Contains functions for operations with fuzzy cognitive maps using t-norm and s-norm operators. T-norms and S-norms are described by Dov M. Gabbay and George Metcalfe (2007) doi:10.1007/s00153-007-0047-1. System indicators are described by Cox, Earl D. (1995) isbn:1886801010. Executable examples are provided in the "inst/examples" folder.
